text.div:
Q Fever (Tests for Coxiella burnetii Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    23024-3 Coxiella burnetii DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    49124-1 Coxiella burnetii identified in Unspecified specimen by Sequencing
    60261-5 Coxiella burnetii DNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    88177-1 Coxiella burnetii DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    88178-9 Coxiella burnetii DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    90442-5 Coxiella burnetii aroE gene [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with non-probe detection
    90443-3 Coxiella burnetii aroE gene [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
